kor.title: 한술담다
kor.intro_desc: 한 잔의 술에 전통과 이야기를 담다.
kor.intro_subdesc: 다양한 전통주에 대해 알아보고, 나와 어울리는 전통주를 찾아보세요.
kor.location_guide: 양조장 및 전통주 판매처 위치 안내
kor.definition_1: 전통주 등의 산업진흥에 관한 법률'에 따라 다음에 해당하는 술을 말한다.
kor.definition_4: 농어업경영체 또는 생산자단체가 지역농산물을 주원료로 제조한 술 (지역특산주)
kor.definition_6: 한 나라나 지역 등에 과거에서부터 이어져오는 양조법으로 만든 술로, 전통적인 양조법을 계승 및 보존하여 빚는 술을 칭한다.
kor.definition_7: 한국의 정서 및 시대상을 반영하는 술로서 과거의 생활방식, 역사와 문화가 담겨있는 술로 정의할 수 있다.

eng.title: HanSulDamDa
eng.intro_desc: A glass of alcohol filled with tradition and stories.
eng.intro_subdesc: Learn about different types of Korean liquor and find the one that suits you.
eng.food_pairing: Foods that go well with Korean liquor
eng.location_guide: Guide to the locations of breweries and Korean liquor stores
eng.definition_1: It refers to alcohol made using brewing methods that have been passed down from the past in a country or region, and is alcohol that is brewed by inheriting and preserving korean brewing methods.
eng.definition_2: Liquor manufactured by a holder of intangible cultural property in the liquor sector
eng.definition_3: Liquor made by a Korean food expert
eng.definition_4: Alcohol produced by agricultural and fishery management organizations or producer groups using local agricultural products as the main ingredient (local specialty alcohol)
eng.definition_6: According to the (Act on Promotion of Korean Liquor Industry, etc.) it refers to the following types of liquor.
eng.definition_7: It can be defined as a liquor that reflects Korean sentiment and the times, and contains the lifestyle, history, and culture of the past.
